title: Pet rescue saga v1.58.10 APK + MOD
description:
Pet rescue saga v1.58.10 APK + MOD (Lives)

From the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and save the pets from the evil Pet Snatchers! Moves are limited so plan them carefully. Your puzzle skills will be tested with hours of block busting fun!

Take on this puzzling Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

â€¢ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
â€¢ Hundreds of pet puzzling levels - more added every 2 weeks!
â€¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!

What's new:
The Pets are traveling to the future and beyond! On their way theyâ€™ve picked up a fabulous update for you, which includes:

NEW LEVELS, there are now 1167 levels of fun for you to enjoy!
-New adventures! Some say thereâ€™s a mysterious mountain that only shows during clear nightsâ€¦
Fun fact! Kim the seal is ready for winter! He LOVES snow and hot chocolates.


The mod will not work if it is installed on a google version.
Requires Android: 2.3+
